system.description: This spell functions like fox's cunning, except that it affects multiple creatures. Each target gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence and the usual benefits to Intelligence-based skills and bonus spells.

components.materialDescription: A few hairs or a pinch of dung from a fox (arcane); divine focus (divine).

system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
